title: In Regional Plan area, no construction shall be allowed within 100 m
clause_text: In Regional Plan area, no construction shall be allowed within 100 m. from the high flood line of natural lake.
section: Distance from Natural Lake and Dam

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
